sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const PlannerRow = (props) => { let catPillStyle = "" const cat = props.budget.category switch (cat) { case "Luxury": catPillStyle = "rounded-full bg-pink-600 py-1 px-1 text-white" break; case "Essential": catPillStyle = "rounded-full bg-blue-600 py-1 px-1 text-white" break; case "Savings": catPillStyle = "rounded-full bg-yellow-600 py-1 px-1 text-white" break; default: catPillStyle = "rounded-full bg-blue-600 py-1 px-1 text-white" } return (
{props.budget.name}
{props.budget.percentage} %
£ {props.budget.monthly}
£ {props.budget.annual}
{props.budget.category}
); } export default PlannerRow;
